core.pubsub.core

Class TopicPublisherImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.pubsub.core.TopicPublisherImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TopicPublisher

    public class TopicPublisherImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TopicPublisher
    Base subscriber class for publish/subscribe communication. It handle the basic configuration for RabbitMQ client and define a default behaviour.
    Author:
    RabbitMQ documentation modify by Manuel Bottazzi

    • Constructor Detail

      • TopicPublisherImpl

        public TopicPublisherImpl(java.lang.String exchangeName)
        Default constructor for class TopicPublisherImpl. It use localhost as host for the message broker server.
        Parameters:
        exchangeName - - the name of the folder to publish in (e.g. "advice"). It has to be the same in both publisher and subscriber.

      • TopicPublisherImpl

        public TopicPublisherImpl(java.lang.String exchangeName,
                          java.lang.String hostIP,
                          int port)
        Default constructor for class TopicPublisherImpl.
        Parameters:
        exchangeName - - the name of the folder to publish in (e.g. "advice"). It has to be the same in both publisher and subscriber.
        hostIP - - the IP String of the host of the message broker server.

    • Method Detail

      • publishMessage

        public void publishMessage(java.lang.String message,
                           java.lang.String routingKey)
        method to publish a message.
        Specified by:
        publishMessage in interface TopicPublisher
        Parameters:
        message - - the message to be sent.
        routingKey - - the specific topic in which publish the message.
